channels.name: ğŸ“œâ”ƒcommunity-guidelines
channels.topic: Detailed community guidelines and rules

pin.title: ğŸ“œ Community Guidelines
pin.description: Please read and follow these guidelines to maintain a positive and supportive creative environment.

fields.name: ğŸ¤ Respect & Support
fields.value:
â€¢ **Be Kind:** Treat all members with respect and kindness
â€¢ **Constructive Feedback:** Provide helpful, constructive criticism
â€¢ **Encourage Growth:** Support fellow creators in their journey
â€¢ **No Harassment:** Bullying, trolling, or harassment will not be tolerated

fields.name: ğŸ¨ Art & Content
fields.value:
â€¢ **Original Work:** Only share your own work or with proper credit
â€¢ **Appropriate Content:** Keep content suitable for all ages
â€¢ **No Spam:** Avoid excessive posting or self-promotion
â€¢ **Quality Content:** Share meaningful and relevant creative work

fields.name: ğŸ’¬ Communication
fields.value:
â€¢ **Stay On Topic:** Use channels for their intended purpose
â€¢ **No Spam:** Avoid excessive messages or emojis
â€¢ **Respect Privacy:** Don't share personal information
â€¢ **Language:** Keep language appropriate and friendly

fields.name: âš–ï¸ Enforcement
fields.value:
â€¢ **Warnings:** First offense usually results in a warning
â€¢ **Timeouts:** Temporary restrictions for repeated offenses
â€¢ **Bans:** Permanent removal for severe violations
â€¢ **Appeals:** Contact staff if you believe you were treated unfairly

footer.text: These guidelines help us maintain a positive creative community!
